title: New: Girls Names – A Troubled See
content:
What’s your favourite Girls Name? Mine is probably Isabella or maybe Claire (via Grimes).

Anyway, how’s about this for a slice of wonderfully upbeat indie-pop, eh? One half of the 7″ split with label mates Weird Dreams, A Troubled See will get it’s release on 25 June via Tough Love Records / Slumberland Records. So, sit back, wash the week away with a few drinks, and vibe out with Girls Names.

NB: The picture has no relevance whatsoever.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
